Body: Possible Duplicates:  How can I uninstall applications that are locked by phone vendor?  How can you uninstall an app that you didn't install on your Droid?  How can I uninstall built-in apps?Is there a way to uninstall or wipe the samsung email app/client from Galaxy S2?I only use gmail app. It's annoying to have the email icon always popping aside the gmail icon in every contacts of my phone..when I only use the gmail.I just can't find a way to take it of my phone:/
Title: How to remove Samsung native email app from Galaxy S2?

history.Text: Is there a way to uninstall or wipe the samsung email app/client from Galaxy S2?I only use gmail app. It's annoying to have the email icon always popping aside the gmail icon in every contacts of my phone..when I only use the gmail.I just can't find a way to take it of my phone:/
How to remove Samsung native email app from Galaxy S2?
